actions.name: Eject Pack
actions.description:
Trigger: The user receives negative combat Stages.
Effect: The user freely moves themselves up to the Movement type of their choice away from triggering attack's source. If the user is an owned Pokémon, they may then immediately be returned their Poké Ball and another Pokémon may immediately be sent out in their place.

cost.trigger: The user receives negative combat Stages.
